thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Kim Sinclair
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Kim Sinclair

author: Kim Sinclair
title: Kim Sinclair
text:
We hired both on the North & South Island of New Zealand & found the staff to be polite, friendly and helpful.
I lost a couple of photography items & traced them back to Omega. They responded quickly to my email & posted them home for me at my request.
We'd happily recommend Omega to anyone needing a hire car in NZ.
